title: Netherlands - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Netherlands stands at AAA with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Netherlands was last set at Aaa with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Netherlands was last reported at AAA with stable outlook. DBRS's credit rating for Netherlands is AAA with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Netherlands thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Netherlands as reported by major credit rating agencies.
